title: Create Data Extraction Program - Longterm potential
snippet: Create a program capable of quickly pulling product and seller details from amazon.com for hundreds of thousands of products using the Amazon API. I am looking to begin work immediately. Please bid only if you are okay with the budget. There is plenty of opportunity for further work down the line. I am willing to pay $7 / hr for that additional work. Please let me know your experience in this field along with the language you will be using. Also, pm me your skype so we can discuss details of the project and begin quickly.
